fields.name: Iron Axe
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) slashing damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: Three melee attacks only one of which can be a Shield Shove. If it uses two hands to make a Spear attack it canâ€™t make an Iron Axe attack that turn.
